name: Spyre (Lucas Bellinazzi)
description:
When Anne finds herself imprisoned in an endless virtual simulation, her only hope to escape becomes cooperating with the prison's assistance drone to reach the server firewall and turn it off. In her quest, she is able to use the drone's abilities to hack the simulation around her and also use cyber guns found within the server to fight enemy spyware.   

This is the first level of a proof of concept game done as a college project in 2020.
